name: GaussianAdditiveNoise
description: Gaussian additive noise with optional smoothing
longDescription: Adds Gaussian random noise to spectral data with optional kernel smoothing for correlated noise simulation. X_aug = X + noise.

parameters.name: sigma
parameters.description: Standard deviation of Gaussian noise relative to signal std

parameters.name: smoothing_kernel_width
parameters.description: Kernel width for noise smoothing (1 = no smoothing)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: MultiplicativeNoise
description: Multiplicative gain noise per sample or wavelength
longDescription: Applies multiplicative noise to simulate gain variations. X_aug = (1 + epsilon) * X.

parameters.name: sigma_gain
parameters.description: Standard deviation of multiplicative gain

parameters.name: per_wavelength
parameters.description: Apply independent gain per wavelength instead of per sample

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: LinearBaselineDrift
longDescription: Simulates linear baseline drift by adding a random offset and slope to spectra. X_aug = X + a + b * wavelength.

parameters.name: offset_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum random offset value

parameters.name: offset_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum random offset value

parameters.name: slope_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum random slope value

parameters.name: slope_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum random slope value

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: PolynomialBaselineDrift
longDescription: Adds a random polynomial baseline drift to spectra. Higher degree polynomials can simulate more complex baseline distortions.

parameters.name: degree
parameters.description: Degree of the polynomial baseline

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: WavelengthShift
longDescription: Simulates wavelength calibration errors by shifting spectra along the x-axis. Uses interpolation to resample at original wavelength positions.

parameters.name: shift_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum wavelength shift (nm or index units)

parameters.name: shift_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum wavelength shift (nm or index units)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: WavelengthStretch
description: Stretch or compress the wavelength axis
longDescription: Stretches or compresses the wavelength axis around the center wavelength. Simulates slight instrument-to-instrument wavelength calibration differences.

parameters.name: stretch_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum stretch factor (< 1.0 = compression)

parameters.name: stretch_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum stretch factor (> 1.0 = expansion)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: LocalWavelengthWarp
description: Non-linear warp of the wavelength axis
longDescription: Applies a non-linear warp to the wavelength axis using spline-interpolated random shifts at control points. Simulates local wavelength distortions.

parameters.name: n_control_points
parameters.description: Number of control points for the warp spline

parameters.name: max_shift
parameters.description: Maximum shift amplitude at control points (nm or index units)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: SmoothMagnitudeWarp
description: Multiply spectrum by a smooth random curve
longDescription: Multiplies the spectrum by a smooth random gain curve generated from spline-interpolated control points. Simulates smooth wavelength-dependent instrument response variations.

parameters.name: n_control_points
parameters.description: Number of control points for the gain spline

parameters.name: gain_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum gain factor at control points

parameters.name: gain_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum gain factor at control points

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: BandPerturbation
description: Perturb specific spectral bands with random gain and offset
longDescription: Perturbs random spectral bands by applying multiplicative gain and additive offset within selected regions. Simulates localized instrument artifacts.

parameters.name: n_bands
parameters.description: Number of bands to perturb

parameters.name: bandwidth_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum bandwidth of perturbed region (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: bandwidth_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum bandwidth of perturbed region (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: gain_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum gain factor applied to bands

parameters.name: gain_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum gain factor applied to bands

parameters.name: offset_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum additive offset applied to bands

parameters.name: offset_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum additive offset applied to bands

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: GaussianSmoothingJitter
longDescription: Applies Gaussian smoothing with a randomly varying sigma to simulate spectral resolution differences between instruments.

parameters.name: sigma_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum Gaussian sigma for smoothing

parameters.name: sigma_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum Gaussian sigma for smoothing

parameters.name: kernel_width
parameters.description: Width of the Gaussian kernel (must be odd)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: UnsharpSpectralMask
longDescription: Applies unsharp masking (sharpening) to spectra. X_aug = X + k * (X - smooth(X)). Enhances fine spectral features with random intensity.

parameters.name: amount_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum sharpening amount

parameters.name: amount_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum sharpening amount

parameters.name: sigma
parameters.description: Gaussian sigma for the smoothing kernel

parameters.name: kernel_width
parameters.description: Width of the Gaussian kernel (must be odd)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: BandMasking
longDescription: Masks out random spectral bands by either zeroing or interpolating across the region. Simulates missing or corrupted spectral regions.

parameters.name: n_bands_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum number of bands to mask

parameters.name: n_bands_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum number of bands to mask

parameters.name: bandwidth_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum bandwidth of masked region (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: bandwidth_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum bandwidth of masked region (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: How to fill masked regions: interpolate between edges or set to zero

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: ChannelDropout
longDescription: Drops individual wavelengths with a given probability, replacing them with zero or interpolated values. Simulates random dead pixels or single-channel corruption.

parameters.name: dropout_prob
parameters.description: Probability of dropping each individual wavelength channel

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: How to fill dropped channels: interpolate from neighbors or set to zero

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: SpikeNoise
description: Add random spike artifacts to spectra
longDescription: Adds sharp spike artifacts at random wavelengths. Simulates cosmic ray hits, electrical interference, or single-point measurement errors.

parameters.name: n_spikes_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum number of spikes per sample

parameters.name: n_spikes_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum number of spikes per sample

parameters.name: amplitude_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum spike amplitude

parameters.name: amplitude_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum spike amplitude

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: LocalClipping
description: Clip values in local regions to simulate saturation
longDescription: Clips spectral values in random local regions to the 90th percentile of the segment. Simulates detector saturation or peak flattening artifacts.

parameters.name: n_regions
parameters.description: Number of regions to clip per sample

parameters.name: width_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum width of clipped region (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: width_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum width of clipped region (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: MixupAugmenter
description: Mixup augmentation by blending sample pairs
longDescription: Creates new samples by blending pairs of existing samples using Beta distribution weights. X_aug = lambda * X_i + (1 - lambda) * X_j.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Beta distribution parameter controlling blend ratio

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: LocalMixupAugmenter
longDescription: Creates new samples by blending each sample with one of its k-nearest neighbors using Beta distribution weights. Produces more realistic augmentations than global mixup.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Beta distribution parameter controlling blend ratio

parameters.name: k_neighbors
parameters.description: Number of nearest neighbors to consider for mixing

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: ScatterSimulationMSC
longDescription: Simulates scatter variation using a simple MSC-style model: x_aug = a + b * x. Can use self-reference or global mean as the reference spectrum.

parameters.name: reference_mode
parameters.description: Reference mode for scatter simulation

parameters.name: a_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum additive scatter coefficient

parameters.name: a_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum additive scatter coefficient

parameters.name: b_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum multiplicative scatter coefficient

parameters.name: b_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum multiplicative scatter coefficient

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: TemperatureAugmenter
longDescription: Simulates temperature effects on NIR spectra including peak position shifts (O-H, N-H bands), intensity changes from hydrogen bonding disruption, and band broadening from thermal motion. Uses literature-based region-specific parameters.

parameters.name: temperature_delta
parameters.description: Fixed temperature change from reference (degrees C). Positive = heating.

parameters.name: temperature_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum random temperature delta. If set, overrides temperature_delta.

parameters.name: temperature_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum random temperature delta. If set, overrides temperature_delta.

parameters.name: reference_temperature
parameters.description: Reference temperature for input spectra (degrees C)

parameters.name: enable_shift
parameters.description: Apply peak position shifts

parameters.name: enable_intensity
parameters.description: Apply intensity changes

parameters.name: enable_broadening
parameters.description: Apply band broadening

parameters.name: region_specific
parameters.description: Apply region-specific effects (recommended). If false, applies uniform average effects.

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: MoistureAugmenter
longDescription: Simulates moisture and water activity effects on NIR spectra. Water activity shifts water bands between free and bound states, affecting peak positions and intensities in the O-H regions.

parameters.name: water_activity_delta
parameters.description: Change in water activity from reference (0-1 scale)

parameters.name: water_activity_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum random water activity delta. If set, overrides water_activity_delta.

parameters.name: water_activity_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum random water activity delta. If set, overrides water_activity_delta.

parameters.name: reference_water_activity
parameters.description: Reference water activity for input spectra

parameters.name: free_water_fraction
parameters.description: Base fraction of water that is free vs bound

parameters.name: bound_water_shift
parameters.description: Wavelength shift (nm) for bound water relative to free water

parameters.name: moisture_content
parameters.description: Base moisture content as fraction (affects intensity)

parameters.name: enable_shift
parameters.description: Apply water band position shifts

parameters.name: enable_intensity
parameters.description: Apply water band intensity changes

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: ParticleSizeAugmenter
description: Simulate particle size effects on scattering
longDescription: Simulates particle size effects on NIR spectra through wavelength-dependent baseline scattering (lambda^(-n) relationship), path length changes, and scatter noise. Smaller particles cause increased scattering at shorter wavelengths.

parameters.name: mean_size_um
parameters.description: Mean particle size in micrometers

parameters.name: size_variation_um
parameters.description: Standard deviation of particle size

parameters.name: size_range_um_min
parameters.description: Minimum random particle size. If set, overrides mean/variation.

parameters.name: size_range_um_max
parameters.description: Maximum random particle size. If set, overrides mean/variation.

parameters.name: reference_size_um
parameters.description: Reference particle size for baseline calculations

parameters.name: wavelength_exponent
parameters.description: Exponent for wavelength dependence (4.0=Rayleigh, 1-2=typical NIR)

parameters.name: size_effect_strength
parameters.description: Overall strength of the scattering effect

parameters.name: include_path_length
parameters.description: Include path length effects (multiplicative)

parameters.name: path_length_sensitivity
parameters.description: How strongly particle size affects effective path length

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: EMSCDistortionAugmenter
longDescription: Simulates the spectral distortions that EMSC corrects: x_distorted = a + b*x + c1*lambda + c2*lambda^2 + ... Useful for training scatter-robust models or simulating instrument transfer.

parameters.name: multiplicative_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum multiplicative gain factor (b term)

parameters.name: multiplicative_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum multiplicative gain factor (b term)

parameters.name: additive_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum additive offset (a term)

parameters.name: additive_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum additive offset (a term)

parameters.name: polynomial_order
parameters.description: Order of wavelength polynomial (0 = no polynomial term)

parameters.name: polynomial_strength
parameters.description: Base strength of polynomial scattering terms

parameters.name: correlation
parameters.description: Correlation between multiplicative and additive terms

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: DetectorRollOffAugmenter
description: Simulate detector sensitivity roll-off at spectral edges
longDescription: Simulates detector sensitivity roll-off at the edges of the spectral range, causing increased noise and baseline distortion at edge wavelengths. Models include InGaAs, PbS, and Silicon CCD detectors.

parameters.name: detector_model
parameters.description: Detector type to simulate

parameters.name: effect_strength
parameters.description: Scaling factor for the roll-off effect

parameters.name: noise_amplification
parameters.description: Additional noise added at low-sensitivity wavelengths

parameters.name: include_baseline_distortion
parameters.description: Include slight baseline distortion at edges

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: StrayLightAugmenter
description: Simulate stray light effects on spectra
longDescription: Simulates stray light (unwanted radiation reaching detector). Causes peak truncation at high absorbance, enhanced at spectral edges. Typical fractions: 0.0001-0.01.

parameters.name: stray_light_fraction
parameters.description: Base stray light as fraction of total signal (0.001 = 0.1%)

parameters.name: edge_enhancement
parameters.description: Factor by which stray light increases at spectral edges

parameters.name: edge_width
parameters.description: Fraction of spectral range considered 'edge' (0-0.5)

parameters.name: include_peak_truncation
parameters.description: Simulate peak height reduction at high absorbance

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: EdgeCurvatureAugmenter
description: Simulate edge curvature and baseline bending
longDescription: Simulates edge curvature from optical aberrations, wavelength-dependent baseline drift, or polynomial baseline correction artifacts. Adds smooth curvature increasing towards spectral edges (smile/frown/asymmetric patterns).

parameters.name: curvature_strength
parameters.description: Maximum curvature amplitude (in absorbance units)

parameters.name: curvature_type
parameters.description: Type of curvature pattern

parameters.name: asymmetry
parameters.description: Left/right curvature ratio for asymmetric type (-1 to 1)

parameters.name: edge_focus
parameters.description: How concentrated the curvature is at edges (higher = sharper)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: TruncatedPeakAugmenter
description: Add truncated absorption peaks at spectral boundaries
longDescription: Simulates truncated absorption peaks from bands centered outside the measured wavelength range. Creates characteristic rising or falling baselines at spectrum boundaries.

parameters.name: peak_probability
parameters.description: Probability of adding truncated peaks per edge (0-1)

parameters.name: amplitude_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum peak amplitude (absorbance units)

parameters.name: amplitude_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum peak amplitude (absorbance units)

parameters.name: width_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum peak width (nm)

parameters.name: width_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum peak width (nm)

parameters.name: left_edge
parameters.description: Add truncated peaks at left (low wavelength) edge

parameters.name: right_edge
parameters.description: Add truncated peaks at right (high wavelength) edge

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: EdgeArtifactsAugmenter
longDescription: Convenience class combining multiple edge artifact effects: detector roll-off, stray light, edge curvature, and truncated peaks. Each effect can be individually enabled/disabled.

parameters.name: detector_roll_off
parameters.description: Enable detector sensitivity roll-off effect

parameters.name: stray_light
parameters.description: Enable stray light effect

parameters.name: edge_curvature
parameters.description: Enable edge curvature/bending effect

parameters.name: truncated_peaks
parameters.description: Enable truncated peak effect at boundaries

parameters.name: overall_strength
parameters.description: Scaling factor for all effects

parameters.name: detector_model
parameters.description: Detector model for roll-off simulation

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: PathLengthAugmenter
longDescription: Multiplicatively scales spectra to simulate variations in optical path length due to sample positioning, particle size effects, or cuvette variations.

parameters.name: path_length_std
parameters.description: Standard deviation of the path length factor distribution

parameters.name: min_path_length
parameters.description: Minimum allowed path length factor (prevents sign inversion)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: BatchEffectAugmenter
longDescription: Simulates variations between measurement sessions or instruments by applying wavelength-dependent additive offset (constant + slope) and multiplicative gain.

parameters.name: offset_std
parameters.description: Standard deviation of the constant offset term

parameters.name: slope_std
parameters.description: Standard deviation of the wavelength-dependent slope

parameters.name: gain_std
parameters.description: Standard deviation of the multiplicative gain (centered at 1.0)

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: InstrumentalBroadeningAugmenter
longDescription: Applies Gaussian convolution to simulate the finite spectral resolution of the instrument. FWHM controls the broadening width. Useful for simulating resolution differences between instruments.

parameters.name: fwhm
parameters.description: Full Width at Half Maximum in wavelength units (nm)

parameters.name: fwhm_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum random FWHM. If set, overrides fixed fwhm.

parameters.name: fwhm_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum random FWHM. If set, overrides fixed fwhm.

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: HeteroscedasticNoiseAugmenter
longDescription: Adds signal-dependent noise where variance scales with signal magnitude. Models shot noise and detector-limited measurements. Noise sigma = noise_base + noise_signal_dep * |X|.

parameters.name: noise_base
parameters.description: Base noise standard deviation (signal-independent component)

parameters.name: noise_signal_dep
parameters.description: Signal-dependent noise coefficient

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: DeadBandAugmenter
longDescription: Zeroes out random wavelength regions and adds noise, simulating detector dead bands or saturation artifacts.

parameters.name: n_bands
parameters.description: Number of dead bands per sample

parameters.name: width_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum dead band width (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: width_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum dead band width (in wavelength points)

parameters.name: noise_std
parameters.description: Standard deviation of noise in dead band regions

parameters.name: probability
parameters.description: Probability of applying dead band to each sample

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

name: Spline_Smoothing
longDescription: Applies a smoothing spline to each spectrum, reducing noise while preserving the overall spectral shape.

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: Spline_X_Perturbations
longDescription: Applies perturbations to the spline knots along the x-axis (wavelength dimension) using B-spline interpolation. Simulates wavelength distortions.

parameters.name: spline_degree
parameters.description: Degree of the spline (3 = cubic)

parameters.name: perturbation_density
parameters.description: Density of perturbation points relative to data size

parameters.name: perturbation_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum perturbation value

parameters.name: perturbation_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum perturbation value

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state

name: Spline_Y_Perturbations
longDescription: Adds a smooth perturbation to the y-axis (intensity dimension) using B-spline interpolation. Simulates smooth baseline or intensity distortions.

parameters.name: spline_points
parameters.description: Number of spline control points. Null = sample length / 2.

parameters.name: perturbation_intensity
parameters.description: Perturbation intensity relative to max value

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: Spline_X_Simplification
description: Simplify spectrum via B-spline along x-axis
longDescription: Simplifies spectra by fitting a B-spline through a subset of randomly or uniformly selected points along the x-axis. Reduces noise and spectral complexity.

parameters.name: spline_points
parameters.description: Number of spline control points. Null = sample length / 4.

parameters.name: uniform
parameters.description: If true, use uniformly spaced points. If false, use random points.

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: Spline_Curve_Simplification
description: Simplify spectrum via B-spline along the curve
longDescription: Simplifies spectra by fitting a B-spline through a subset of control points selected along the curve path. Similar to x-simplification but considers the curve geometry.

parameters.name: spline_points
parameters.description: Number of spline control points. Null = sample length / 4.

parameters.name: uniform
parameters.description: If true, use uniformly spaced points. If false, use random points.

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state

name: Random_X_Operation
longDescription: Applies a random element-wise operation (default: multiplication) with random values drawn from a specified range. Simulates general per-wavelength random distortions.

parameters.name: operator_range_min
parameters.description: Minimum value for the random operator

parameters.name: operator_range_max
parameters.description: Maximum value for the random operator

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Random seed for reproducibility

name: Rotate_Translate
longDescription: Augments data by adding a piecewise-linear distortion (rotation + translation). Creates a random inflection point and applies different slopes on each side, scaled by the per-sample standard deviation.

parameters.name: p_range
parameters.description: Range for generating random slope values

parameters.name: y_factor
parameters.description: Scaling factor for the initial offset value

parameters.name: variation_scope
parameters.description: Scope of random variation: per-sample or shared across batch
